member.name: ID3D10ShaderResourceView.GetDesc
member.summary: Get the shader resource view's description.
member.param: A pointer to a structure to be filled with data about the shader resource view.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderResourceView
member.summary: A shader-resource-view interface specifies the subresources a shader can access during rendering. Examples of shader resources include a constant buffer, a texture buffer, a texture or a sampler.
